Timeline
==============================================================================

This document contains more or less the timeline of the project progress,
open questions and notes regarding the theory and implementation.

20191030
--------
Sphinx documentation, as well as the python test suite are up and running. The
geometry modules are 40% done.

20191023
--------
I've cleaned up the old code (kept what can be reused) and set up the
R-markdown notebook. My Skype client on the Linux machine should be
working fine now, too.
